ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server

Class HttpUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.server.HttpUtilities

  • public class HttpUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a few methods for processing HTTP requests, mostly when they have a binary payload.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

        Parameters:

        boundary - The sequence to look for
        position - The start position in the array
        Returns:

      • trimByteArray

        public static byte[] trimByteArray(byte[] in_array)
        Trims an array of bytes from any bytes in the beginning and the end that are either CR or LF. This is used to remove carriage returns from a field in an HTTP request
        Parameters:
        in_array - The array of bytes
        Returns:
        The new array of bytes without the first and last two bytes
